description.desc1: Receives Spout textures (Windows only - see SyphonReceive for OSX) for further processing inside SPARCK

texture dim.descript: resizes the received texture to this dimensions

flip.descript: flip recieved texture in x / y axis

render pass.descript: render pass in which this node passes on the received texture.

Notes.note1: Spout textures arrive at SPARCK asynchronously. SPARCK checks for a new texture at the end of each frame-pass. On the chosen render-pass the texture is passed on for further processing.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
